name: budibase
description: Budibase is a low-code platform for building business apps without code. It includes a UI builder, database integration, automations, and the ability to self-host or use their cloud service for internal tool development.
features: Low-Code Platform: Build business apps without writing code. Rapid development.
UI Builder: Drag-and-drop interface designer for custom apps. Visual development.
Database Integration: Connect to existing databases or use built-in storage. Flexible data.
Workflow Automation: Automate business processes with visual workflows. Streamlined operations.
Internal Tools: Perfect for building admin panels and dashboards. Custom solutions.
Self-Hosted: Run on your own infrastructure for complete control. Data sovereignty.
Cloud Option: Choose between self-hosted or managed cloud. Flexible deployment.
API Access: Programmatic access for custom integrations. Developer-friendly.
